credentials.description: Either the path to or the contents of a [service account key file](https://cloud.google.com/iam/docs/creating-managing-service-account-keys) in JSON format. If not provided, the [application default credentials](https://cloud.google.com/sdk/gcloud/reference/auth/application-default) will be used.

domain.description: The domain you want to verify.

token.description: The token you got from data.googlesiteverification_dns_token. This forces a new verification in case the token changes.

domain.description: The domain you want to verify.

record_name.description: The name of the record you should create.

record_type.description: The type of DNS record you should create.

record_value.description: The value of the record you should create.
